turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Khosrow I.
turn.1: What were the duties of the viziers?
turn.2: These great landowners enjoyed tax exemptions from the Sasanian empire, and were tax collectors within their local provincial areas.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: With the outbreak of the Mazdakite revolution, there was a great uprising of peasants and lower-class citizens who grabbed large portions of land under egalitarian values.
turn.6: As a result of this there was great confusion on land possession and ownership.
turn.7: How did Khosrow I. respond to this?
turn.8: Khosrow surveyed all the land within the empire indiscriminately and began to tax all land under a single program.
turn.10: Tax revenues that previously went to the local noble family now went to the central government treasury.
turn.12: The fixed tax that Khosrow implemented created a more stable form of income for the treasury.
